summary: The young, despotic and untalented artist Adolf Hitler comes to Vienna to study art. He befriends the Jew Schlomo Herzl working on a novel with the title "Mein Kampf". Hitler is rejected by... See full summary »
cast: Götz George|Tom Schilling|Anna Unterberger|Bernd Birkhahn|Wolf Bachofner|Elisabeth Orth|Karin Neuhäuser|Simon Schwarz|Paul Matic|Henning Peker|Wolfgang Hübsch|Ernst Stankovski|Michael Ostrowski|Franz Josef Csencsits|Kajetan Dick|Andrej Hryc|Kurt Grossmann|Henriette Schwager|Patricia Hirschbichler|Christine Gabsch|Peter Traxler|Marlen Ulonska|Philipp Lätsch|Roland May|Fritz von Friedl|Jan Gebauer|Robert Sadil|Walter Szakall|Uwe Lach|Detlef Lux|Stefan Wancura|Helmut Hagen|Thomas Morris|Perica Antov
title: Mein Kampf
